parameters.Name: query_threat
parameters.Description: One value or multiple comma seperated values. Threats have the following range: 1 to 5

parameters.Name: query_score
parameters.Description: One value or multiple comma seperated values. Scores have the following range: 3 to 20

parameters.Name: query_severity
parameters.Description: One value or multiple comma seperated values. Severity have the following range: 1 to 5

parameters.Name: query_start_date
parameters.Description: Query for results after the given date. Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_end_date
parameters.Description: Query for results before the given date. Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_site
parameters.Description: Query by site id or site label.

parameters.Name: query_status
parameters.Description: May be 'open','closed', 'certified', or some combination of the three. Ex. - "open, closed"

parameters.Name: query_class
parameters.Description: Query by the short or long vulnerability classification name.

parameters.Name: query_found
parameters.Description: Query for results found since a given date. Date format: Valid ISO8601  (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_opened
parameters.Description: Query for results opened since a given date. Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_closed
parameters.Description: Query for results closed since a given date. Date format: Valid ISO8601 (that means UTC (aka GMT)) (Ex. 'YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ' -> '2008-12-12T21:35:59Z')

parameters.Name: query_url
parameters.Description: Provide some portion of a url to search for. Ex. - Entering "testsite" will return any vulnerability with a url containing the string "testsite".

parameters.Name: query_tags
parameters.Description: Search tags

parameters.Name: query_tag_search_type
parameters.Description: Changes the behavior of query_tags when more than one tag is specified. If it's 'all' then all tags must be present to match, 'none' no tags must match, 'any' any tag may match.

parameters.Name: display_vulnerability
parameters.Description: Display vulnervailities.

parameters.Name: display_attack_vectors
parameters.Description: Display attack vectors.

parameters.Name: display_attack_vectors_limit
parameters.Description: Number of attack vectors to display per vulnerability. [NOT WORKING - 11/29/12]

parameters.Name: display_attack_vectors_notes
parameters.Description: Display attack vector notes in full.

parameters.Name: display_attack_vectors_flagged
parameters.Description: If attack vector is flagged, will display flag.

parameters.Name: display_description
parameters.Description: Display general information about vulnerability. 'custom' option will display custom descriptions.

parameters.Name: display_solution
parameters.Description: Display general vulnerability solution information. 'custom' option will display custom solutions.

parameters.Name: display_qanda
parameters.Description: Display Q & A

parameters.Name: display_request
parameters.Description: Display request information.

parameters.Name: display_response
parameters.Description: Display response information.

parameters.Name: display_body
parameters.Description: Dependent upon display_response being 1, will not show if display_response is not 1.

parameters.Name: display_headers
parameters.Description: Dependent upon display_request and display_response. If either is not chosen, respective headers will not be displayed.

parameters.Name: display_abbr
parameters.Description: Display an abbreviated match as part of the response content.

parameters.Name: display_stats
parameters.Description: Display statistics for all user-accessible sites.

parameters.Name: display_param
parameters.Description: Dependent upon display_request, if display_request is not '1', then display_param will not be shown.

parameters.Name: display_has_notes
parameters.Description: Displays whether notes exist for vulnerabilities and attack vectors.

parameters.Name: display_cvss
parameters.Description: Displays cvss_score and cvss_vector (What are those?)

parameters.Name: display_tags
parameters.Description: Display tags.

parameters.Name: page:limit
parameters.Description: Limit results to n number of pages.

parameters.Name: page:offset
parameters.Description: Begin showing results from page number n.

parameters.Name: page:order_by
parameters.Description: Order the results.

parameters.Name: vuln_id
parameters.Description: Vulnerability id; Can be one, or comma-seperated list of ids
